Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen, or delivery within the ZÃ¼rich area may be arranged. Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch â€” from resting the dough to letting the filling set â€” please allow at least 3 daysâ€™ notice for your order.

title: Homemade American-style Pies and Treats in ZÃ¼rich â€“ Pickup & Delivery
text:
Flaky is a cozy home-based microbakery in the ZÃ¼rich area making American-style pies and treatsâ€”from buttery, flaky crusts to chewy and sweet rice krispie treats. Everything is handmade with high-quality Swiss ingredients. Order online for pickup in Wallisellen or delivery across ZÃ¼rich. Seasonal favorites include pumpkin, pecan, apple & key lime.





Products
American sweets are pure happiness â€” simple and full of flavor. The tang of buttermilk and cream cheese, the sweetness of maple syrup, and all that buttery goodnessâ€¦ they take me right back to my childhood. Theyâ€™re not about perfection â€” theyâ€™re about warmth, joy, and the feeling of home.
And pies? The flakiness of a pie crust combined with a sweet and creamy filling or a fragrant fruit is just joy.
Every pie and treat is baked fresh to order â€” I only bake after a reservation, so each creation gets the care and time it deserves. Whether youâ€™re craving something familiar or want to try a new twist on a classic, Iâ€™ll bake it with love â€” just for you.

Creamy spiced pumpkin custard in a crisp, flaky shell â€” fall in a slice.







Treats & More

Chewy, toasty-sweet bars with a nutty sesame twist.





  



Bell Pepper and Feta Cornbread



Savory-sweet cornbread topped with creamy peppers and tangy feta.





  



American Biscuits



Classic, Cheddar & Chive, or Blueberry â€” so flaky and tender!





  



Custom Order



Special flavors, mini treats, occasion pies â€” Iâ€™ll bake your idea with love!








Prices and Order



About
Hi, Iâ€™m Marianna ðŸ‘‹
Iâ€™m a researcher by profession â€” and a pastry chef by heart.
Originally from Italy, I trained and became certified in professional pastry before moving to Switzerland in 2016. Growing up, I spent much of my childhood travelling through the USA, where I fell in love with flaky American pies and treats.
Now, as a new mom, Iâ€™ve opened a small microbakery from my home â€” a space where I can share my love for pastry while spending precious time with my baby.
